item.title: Boulder attack suspect allegedly waited until daughter graduated to carry out plan
item.description: The man suspected of carrying out an "act of terrorism" on a pedestrian mall in Boulder, Colorado, is in the United States illegally.

item.title: Trump administration appeals 2nd ruling blocking tariffs
item.description: The Trump administration has asked a federal appeals court to block an order last week that found the president's sweeping tariffs were "unlawful."
